channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: ee99642a-225b-4fe8-a771-9d9036053e87
Display name: Arc Container Storage Contributor
Description: Create, read, modify, and delete Arc Container Storage resources on connected clusters. This role is in preview and subject to change.
Link: https://management.azure.com/ee99642a-225b-4fe8-a771-9d9036053e87?api-version=2022-04-01
